title: Peter Schiff Twitter Apparently Hacked, Shills Gold Crypto, Son Spencer Warns
description: The Twitter account of Bitcoin critic Peter Schiff was found advertising a gold-branded token as a result of an apparent hacking. title: XRP Climbs 12% As Crypto Celebrates 11-Year Milestone
description: XRP is now marking its 11th year since its inception. Over the past decade, XRP has established itself as a prominent player in the blockchain industry, captivating the attention of investors and enthusiasts alike.Â  With its all-time performance reaching remarkable heights, the crypto continues to demonstrate its resilience and enduring value in the ever-evolving landscape of digital finance. The introduction of the escrow mechanism serves as a mechanism to ensure a controlled and predictable release of tokens into the market.
